Hash Model Updates&#xa;H(Œ∏·µ¢) = SHA-256(updates)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="50" width="320" x="720" y="505" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cNW1Fs1zWVFqoxF8FarJ-23" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#E1BEE7;strokeColor=#7C2C91;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1;fontSize=13;" value="2. Node ID: District_A&#xa;‚Ä¢ Timestamp: 2026-01-25&#xa;‚Ä¢ Digital Signature: ‚úì Verified&#xa;‚Ä¢ Block Number: 1,284,567" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="110" width="320" x="720" y="705" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cNW1Fs1zWVFqoxF8FarJ-26" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#7C2C91;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=12;fontStyle=1;" Federated Averaging&#xa;Œ∏_global = Œ£(n·µ¢¬∑Œ∏·µ¢) / Œ£(n·µ¢)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="55" width="290" x="1180" y="635" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cNW1Fs1zWVFqoxF8FarJ-36" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FFE0B2;strokeColor=#D79B00;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1;fontSize=13;" value="4. <mxGeometry height="50" width="50" x="445" y="375" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cNW1Fs1zWVFqoxF8FarJ-54" parent="1" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#7C2C91;strokeColor=#7C2C91;fontColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=16;fontStyle=1;" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">PHASE 2</font>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="50" width="50" x="855" y="375" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cNW1Fs1zWVFqoxF8FarJ-55" parent="1" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#1976D2;strokeColor=#1976D2;fontColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=16;fontStyle=1;" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">PHASE 4</font>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="50" width="50" x="1730" y="375" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cNW1Fs1zWVFqoxF8FarJ-57" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FFEBEE;strokeColor=#C62828;strokeWidth=3;fontSize=13;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#B71C1C;align=center;" value="üîí PRIVACY GUARANTEE: Raw FMD data never leaves district nodes. Only encrypted, differential-privacy-protected model updates are transmitted through blockchain-verified channels." vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="50" width="1600" x="330" y="1060" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cNW1Fs1zWVFqoxF8FarJ-58" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FFF9E6;strokeColor=#D79B00;strokeWidth=3;align=left;spacingLeft=20;fontSize=13;" value="<b>SYSTEM FEATURES:</b>&#xa;‚úì Differential Privacy (Œµ-DP)&#xa;‚úì Blockchain Verification&#xa;‚úì Byzantine Fault Tolerance&#xa;‚úì Low-Connectivity Optimized&#xa;‚úì Hyperledger Fabric (PBFT)&#xa;‚úì Immutable Audit Trail" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="180" width="350" x="1150" y="810" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cNW1Fs1zWVFqoxF8FarJ-59" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#1976D2;strokeColor=#1976D2;strokeWidth=3;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=14;align=center;" value="Updated Global Model&#xa;Distributed to All Districts" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="60" width="350" x="1580" y="810" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cNW1Fs1zWVFqoxF8FarJ-60" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#BBDEFB;strokeColor=#1976D2;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=12;align=center;fontStyle=2;" value="Continuous Training Cycle:&#xa;Rounds 1 ‚Üí 2 ‚Üí 3 ‚Üí ... ‚Üí N" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="50" width="350" x="1580" y="890" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cNW1Fs1zWVFqoxF8FarJ-61" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#C8E6C9;strokeColor=#2C5F2D;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=12;fontStyle=1;align=center;" value="N = 50 District Nodes" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="280" x="330" y="1010" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(213, 232, 212), rgb(31, 47, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));

div.div: üîí PRIVACY GUARANTEE: Raw FMD data never leaves district nodes. Only encrypted, differential-privacy-protected model updates are transmitted through blockchain-verified channels.

switch.text: üîí PRIVACY GUARANTEE: Raw FMD data never leaves district nodes. Only encrypted, differential-privacy-protected model updates are transmitted through blockchain-verified channels.

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
SYSTEM FEATURES:
‚úì Differential Privacy (Œµ-DP)
‚úì Blockchain Verification
‚úì Byzantine Fault Tolerance
‚úì Low-Connectivity Optimized
‚úì Hyperledger Fabric (PBFT)
‚úì Immutable Audit Trail

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(25, 118, 210), rgb(79, 159, 238)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(25, 118, 210), rgb(79, 159, 238));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 348px; height: 1px; padding-top: 465px; margin-left: 1252px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #FFFFFF;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#FFFFFF, #121212); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Updated Global Model Distributed to All Districts

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(187, 222, 251), rgb(25, 55, 80)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(25, 118, 210), rgb(79, 159, 238));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 348px; height: 1px; padding-top: 540px; margin-left: 1252px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
